item.title: Firefox - FF Keeps Running in Background After Closing Browser
item.description: Even after closing Firefox, looking in the task manager reveals that firefox.exe is still a running process. Additionally, some users may experience graphics glitchiness where tab titles go missing or a pixelated look to the Firefox graphics. Open Firefox. Choose Options Select the Advanced vertical menu item, then select the the General tab. Uncheck “Use hardware acceleration when available” Close Firefox Open Task Manager and close any rogue instances of Firefox.

item.title: Firefox - Can't log into SSRS Web Portal NTLM
